name: Agents: Mission: Slip N' Slide Snowfall
name_original: Agents: Mission: Slip N' Slide Snowfall
description: Help Agent Hotman traverse the terrain of the North Pole. Use the left and right arrow keys to move around, press the up arrow key to jump, the F arrow to fire your gun, and press the P button to pause at any time. Your mission is to get to the top of the mountain and get past any enemies or obstacles along the way. Be careful because it'll be a slippery ascent!
